timeline.bodyText: An incorrect regexp accepted by the previous algorithm, but not by the current one. I'll probably add a bulletproof wellformedness check in a separate PR
timeline.author: donnerpeter
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1522,7 +1522,7 @@ Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA
             </antipattern>
             <antipattern>
                 <token regexp="yes">practica|practicas</token>
-                <token regexp="yes">tú|?</token>
+                <token regexp="yes">tú|\?</token>
